definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be dazzling (Targum [[חַחְחַח]] polish; Syr. s.ah. be scorched, Aph. declare in writing (make clear), s.ah.iyh.o0 clarus, lucidus, fulgidus; s.ah.s.ah.a0nun, s.ah.s.ah.un, smooth, plain);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl [[חַחוּ מֵהָּלָב]] La 4:7 (‖[[זַכּוּ מִשֶּׁלֶג]]), they are more dazzling (i.e. whiter) than milk (of effeminate skin).
